name: Fleet
benefit: While you are wearing light or no armor, your base speed increases by 5 feet. You lose the benefits of this feat if you carry a medium or heavy load.
special: You can take this feat multiple times. The effects stack.
mythicDescription: You’re fantastically light on your feet.
mythicBenefit: Your base land speed increases by 5 feet, regardless of what armor you wear or whether you’re encumbered. This bonus stacks with the bonus gained from Fleet.
mythicSpecial: You can take this feat multiple times, but no more than the number of times you’ve taken non-mythic Fleet. The effects stack.
benefit_zh: 当穿着轻型或不穿盔甲时，你的基本移动速度增加5尺。当你处于中度或重度负荷时失去本专长效果。
special_zh: 你可以多次选择此专长，其效果累计。
